{{cpp/keyword/title|{{tt|and_eq}}}}
{{cpp/keyword/navbar}}

===Usage===
* [[cpp/language/operator alternative|alternative operators]]: as an alternative for {{tt|1=&amp;=}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;bitset&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::bitset&lt;4&gt; mask("1100");
    std::bitset&lt;4&gt; val("0111");
    val and_eq mask;
    std::cout &lt;&lt; val &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
0100
}}
